name: Alameda County Court Self-Help Center
description: Free help with court forms and self-representation in Alameda County courts
fullDescription: The Alameda County Law Library Self-Help Center provides free assistance to people representing themselves in court matters.
whatTheyOffer:
- Free help with court forms and procedures
- Family law assistance (divorce, custody, support)
- Restraining order help
- Small claims guidance
- Landlord-tenant matters
- Referrals to legal services
howToGetIt:
1. Visit the Self-Help Center at Alameda County Law Library
2. Or access online resources at acgov.org/law
3. Bring your court papers
4. Staff can help with forms but cannot give legal advice
keywords: self-help, court, Alameda, Oakland, forms, family law, divorce, custody, restraining order, small claims, eviction, free legal help
